summary: ANTI-GLARE CHROMATIC FLUID IS LEAKING FROM DRIVER'S SIDE MIRROR DUE TO A DEFECTIVE SEAL IN THIS MIRROR CAUSING POOR VISION PROBLEMS.  DEALER QUOTING $440.00 TO REPAIR THIS SAFETY ISSUE. BELIEVE THIS PROBLEM SHOULD BE CONSIDERED A SAFETY ISSUE SINCE IT IS EFFECTING DRIVER'S VISON OF ONCOMING TRAFFIC DURING LANE CHANGES DURING BACKING OF THE VEHICLE.*AK
